name: Phenomenon Search for truth-Forest Kriston DEMO(Update old version!)
name_original: Phenomenon Search for truth-Forest Kriston DEMO(Update old version!)
description:
Game is created on the Unity platform

Genre of Indi-horror.

Updating the old DEMO version!!!!!

At the demo stage, only Russian is available. The release version will add English.

Game is created on the Unity platform. Genre of Indi-horror. Main scenario. All actions in a game have happened around our hero. Which is engaged in studying of the inexplicable supernatural phenomena, in different points of the planet. Actions happen in the forest Kriston

Official site

https://phenomenonhorror.wordp...

Minimum system requirements;

32-bit (x86) or the 64-digit (x64) processor with a clock frequency of 2,4 GHz.

2 GB (for the 32-bit processor) or 4 GB (for the 64-bit processor) the RAM.

4 GB a blank space on the hard drive

nVidia GeForce GTX 650

The recommended system requirements;

The 64-bit processor with a clock frequency of 3,4 GHz or above.

8 GB of the RAM with the 64-digit processor.

4 GB a blank space on the hard drive

nVidia GeForce GTX 950
